title: All who incite violence must be brought to justice: Namal
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Law and order must prevail for Sri Lanka to move forward, says former Minister Namal Rajapaksa.

In a tweet, the former Minister said that all those who were involved in spreading hate and inciting violence must be brought to justice, while all those who damaged both private and public property must be held accountable.
The former Minister also previously tweeted that he will extend his fullest cooperation to any investigation taking place with regard to the incidents which took place on 9th May.
